snippet: Paul Lawrie, the 1999 British Open winner, was honored by Britain’s Queen Elizabeth II with the Order of the British Empire because of his foundation.
lead_paragraph: Paul Lawrie, the 1999 British Open winner, was honored by Britain’s Queen Elizabeth II with the Order of the British Empire because of his foundation.
